1:
Give thanks to Yahweh, for he is good,\q for his covenant faithfulness endures forever.
\q
2:
Let Israel say,\q "His covenant faithfulness endures forever."


\q
3:
Let the house of Aaron say,\q "His covenant faithfulness endures forever."
\q
4:
Let the loyal followers of Yahweh say,\q "His covenant faithfulness endures for ever."


\q
5:
In my distress I called out to Yahweh;\q Yahweh answered me and set me free.
\q
6:
Yahweh is with me; I will not be afraid;\q what can man do to me?
\q
7:
Yahweh is on my side as my helper;\q I will look in triumph on those who hate me.


\q
8:
It is better to take shelter in Yahweh\q than to put confidence in man.
\q
9:
It is better to take refuge in Yahweh\q than to put one's trust in a princes.


\q
10:
All the nations surrounded me;\q in Yahweh's name I cut them off.
\q
11:
They surrounded me; yes, they surrounded me;\q in Yahweh's name I cut them off.
\q
13:
They attacked me to knock me down,\q but Yahweh helped me.
\q
14:
Yahweh is my strength and joy,\q and he is the one who rescues me.


\q
15:
The joyful shout of victory is heard in the tents of the righteous;\q the right hand of Yahweh conquers.
\q
16:
The right hand of Yahweh is exalted;\q the right hand of Yahweh conquers.


\q
17:
I will not die, but live\q and declare the deeds of Yahweh.
\q
18:
Yahweh has punished me harshly;\q but he has not handed me over to death.


\q
19:
Open to me the gates of righteousness;\q I will enter them and I will give thanks to Yahweh.
\q
20:
This is the gate of Yahweh;\q the righteous enter through it.
\q
21:
I will give thanks to you, for you answered me,\q and you have become my salvation.


\q
22:
The stone that the builders rejected\q has become the cornerstone.
\q
23:
This is Yahweh's doing;\q it is marvelous in our eyes.


\q
24:
This is the day on which Yahweh has acted;\q we will rejoice and be glad in it.
\q
25:
Please, Yahweh, give us victory!\q Please, Yahweh, give us success!


\q
26:
Blessed is he who comes in the name of Yahweh;\q we bless you from the house of Yahweh.
\q
27:
Yahweh is God, and he has given us light;\q bind the sacrifice with cords to the horns of the altar.
\q
28:
You are my God, and I will give thanks to you;\q you are my God; I will exalt you.


\q
29: Oh, give thanks to Yahweh; for he is good;\q for his covenant faithfulness endures forever.
